	army_command_structure_hidden = 1
	armygroup_command_structure_hidden = 1

	capital_ship_boilers_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_turbines_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_screws_optimalisation_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_rudder_optimalisation_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_hull_shape_optimalisation_hidden = 0

	battleship_armour_thickness_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_vertical_protection_hidden	= 0
	capital_ship_horizontal_protection_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_torpedo_protection_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 0

	fast_battleship_hidden = 0
		
	capitalship_armament_hidden = 1
	capitalship_armament_AP_ammo_hidden = 0	
	capitalship_armament_HE_ammo_hidden = 0	
	capitalship_secondary_hidden = 0	
	four_three_hidden = 1

	capital_ship_light_anti_air_artilery_hidden = 0		
	capital_ship_medium_anti_air_artilery_hidden = 0	
	capital_ship_heavy_anti_air_artilery_hidden = 0	
	largewarship_surface_radar_hidden = 0		
	largewarship_air_detection_radar_hidden = 0		
	capitalship_damage_control_hidden = 0		
	fire_control_computer_hidden = 0		
	AAA_control_computer_hidden = 0	
	floatplane_dev_scout_hidden = 0	
	floatplane_dev_torpedo_hidden = 0		
	floatplane_dev_fighter_hidden = 0		
	
	#officer_recruitment_program_hidden = 0
	#Ship_Building_Technologies_hidden = 0
	naval_underway_replenishment_hidden = 0
	battleship_crew_training_hidden = 0
	battlefleet_concentration_doctrine_hidden = 0
	spotting_hidden = 0
}

	battleship_technology_hidden = 1

	capital_ship_boilers_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_turbines_hidden = 1

	capital_ship_horizontal_protection_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_torpedo_protection_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 1

	fast_battleship_hidden = 0

	capitalship_armament_AP_ammo_hidden = 0	
	capitalship_armament_HE_ammo_hidden = 0

	four_two_hidden = 1

	largewarship_air_detection_radar_hidden = 1		
	capitalship_damage_control_hidden = 0		
	fire_control_computer_hidden = 3		
	AAA_control_computer_hidden = 0	
	floatplane_dev_scout_hidden = 0	
	floatplane_dev_torpedo_hidden = 0		
	floatplane_dev_fighter_hidden = 0

	#Ship_Building_Technologies_hidden = 0

	battleship_technology_hidden = 1
	battleship_class_hidden = 0
	
	capital_ship_engine_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_boilers_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_turbines_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_screws_optimalisation_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_rudder_optimalisation_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_hull_shape_optimalisation_hidden = 0

	battleship_armour_thickness_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_vertical_protection_hidden	= 0
	capital_ship_horizontal_protection_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_torpedo_protection_hidden = 0
	capital_ship_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 0

	fast_battleship_hidden = 0

	capitalship_armament_AP_ammo_hidden = 0	
	capitalship_armament_HE_ammo_hidden = 0	
	capitalship_secondary_hidden = 0	
	three_two_two_three_hidden = 1

	capital_ship_heavy_anti_air_artilery_hidden = 0

	capital_ship_engine_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_boilers_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_turbines_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_screws_optimalisation_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_rudder_optimalisation_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_hull_shape_optimalisation_hidden = 1

	battleship_armour_thickness_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_vertical_protection_hidden	= 1
	capital_ship_horizontal_protection_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_torpedo_protection_hidden = 1
	capital_ship_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 1

	fast_battleship_hidden = 0
		
	capitalship_armament_hidden = 1
	capitalship_armament_AP_ammo_hidden = 0	
	capitalship_armament_HE_ammo_hidden = 0	
	capitalship_secondary_hidden = 1	
	four_three_hidden = 1

	capital_ship_light_anti_air_artilery_hidden = 1		
	capital_ship_medium_anti_air_artilery_hidden = 1	
	capital_ship_heavy_anti_air_artilery_hidden = 1	
	largewarship_surface_radar_hidden = 1		
	largewarship_air_detection_radar_hidden = 1		
	capitalship_damage_control_hidden = 0		
	fire_control_computer_hidden = 3		
	AAA_control_computer_hidden = 0	
	floatplane_dev_scout_hidden = 0	
	floatplane_dev_torpedo_hidden = 0		
	floatplane_dev_fighter_hidden = 0

	battlefleet_concentration_doctrine_hidden = 1
